ComicInfo.Title: Sticky Situations
ComicInfo.Summary: OverviewIt's DEADPOOL vs. SPIDER-MAN!! It's the wisecracking face-off of a lifetime-a veritable smart#$% smackdown! What brought them together? We're not telling! Who will win? Hopefully, Spidey, since at the least he'd let DP keep breathing. Wait-what's that you ask? Of course there's a REASON why they're fighting...and it's guaranteed to make sense!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:05:59. [CVDB106411]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Dan Buckley, Nicole Wiley Boose, Rob Schwager
ComicInfo.Editor: Joe Quesada, John Barber, Nicole Wiley Boose, Ralph Macchio
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Box, Cable, Captain America, Deadpool, Dominus, Irene Merryweather, J. Jonah Jameson, Ken Ellis, Nick Fury, Robbie Robertson, Spider-Man
